bio:
Rondach, a Breton man, lives in Markarth. He works at Understone Keep as the assistant for Anton Virane, the keep's head chef.
 Understone Keep, an ancient Dwemer/Dwarven keep built into the mountainside, is used as a palace by the Jarl of Markarth.
Rondach's sister Voada also works as Anton's assistant. Rondach and Voada's father is Ainethach. Ainethach is the mayor of Karthwasten, a mining settlement in the northeastern section of the Reach.
name: Rondach
